meta.description: The open source, cross platform, free C, C++ and Fortran IDE

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
Code::Blocks is a free C, C++ and Fortran IDE built to meet the most demanding needs of its users.
It is designed to be very extensible and fully configurable.
Finally, an IDE with all the features you need, having a consistent look, feel and operation across platforms.
meta.name: codeblocks
